entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:49 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 07:49 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:49 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
